title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1925.1 - In general
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1925.1 - In general

State Regulations

The rules and regulations set forth in Subchapter B govern
the administration of the department's residential treatment facility day
reporting center program. Day reporting center programs may only be established
at correctional facilities classified as residential treatment
facilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
1925.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
